PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-00962019-02-23,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectEnvironmental Emergency Regulations, 2019
PrecisENVIRONMENTAL EMERGENCY REGULATIONS, 2019 in order to (1) further enhance environmental emergency management in Canada; (2) clarify and strengthen existing regulatory requirements; (3) ensure that the information available to public safety organizations and the Department is reliable; and (4) help in minimizing the frequency and consequences of environmental emergencies in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0051 Publication Date: 2019-03-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Environmental Emergency Regulations, 2019
precis: ENVIRONMENTAL EMERGENCY REGULATIONS, 2019 in order to (1) further enhance environmental emergency management in Canada; (2) clarify and strengthen existing regulatory requirements; (3) ensure that the information available to public safety organizations and the Department is reliable; and (4) help in minimizing the frequency and consequences of environmental emergencies in Canada.
